attributes.action: make the BBC make a third series of Gavin and Stacey on BBC3
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to start a petition to make the BBC aware that there are millions of fans who want a third series of the smash hit Gavin and Stacey on BBC3

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
